name: Shopaholic's Christmas Date-Beauty‘s Secret Closet
description:
Shopaholic's Christmas Date is a funny dress up game.
The Christmas is comings soon, the beautiful princess have made an appointment with her handsome boyfriend to go for shopping today, they plant buy some christmas stuffs to celebrate the christmas, the girls want to have a new clothes, new hairstyles and she must be look amazing to her lover, sweet babies, come and help to dress up the princess.

Game Features:
- A beautiful and lovely princess will be your dress up model
- The christmas is coming, makeup the beautiful princess
- Pretty clothes and dresses, dress up the fashion princess christmas look
- Well dress up the princess, let her lover be crazy for her
